languages.text: Попытка устранить пророка вылилась в вооруженное противостояние между его последователями и блюстителями пустотного корабля. К концу полета секта была устранена, однако это стоило жизни многим хорошим слугам Императора.

An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.
languages.original_text: Попытка устранить пророка вылилась в вооруженное противостояние между его последователями и блюстителями пустотного корабля. К концу полета секта была устранена, однако это стоило жизни многим хорошим слугам Императора.

traits.locale_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the guards of the voidfaring vessel. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had to give up their lives.

An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the guards of the voidfaring vessel. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had to give up their lives.

An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the guards of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the guards of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

languages.text: 领主舰长命令除掉这位先知，这导致船上的执法者与先知的追随者之间爆发了武装冲突。航行结束时，这支教派被彻底消灭了，但帝皇许多忠诚的仆人都因此丧了命。
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长命令除掉这位先知，这导致船上的镇压者与先知的追随者之间爆发了武装冲突。航行结束时，这支教派被彻底消灭了，但帝皇许多忠诚的仆人都因此丧了命。

languages.text: Un intento de destituir al profeta desembocó en un enfrentamiento armado entre sus seguidores y los ejecutores de la nave del vacío. El culto fue eliminado al final del viaje, pero no antes de que muchos buenos servidores del Emperador perdieran la vida.
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

traits.locale_text: Un intento de destituir al profeta desembocó en un enfrentamiento armado entre sus seguidores y los ejecutores de la nave del vacío. El culto fue eliminado al final del viaje, pero no antes de que muchos buenos servidores del Emperador perdieran la vida.

languages.text: 預言者を始末しようとしたところ、その信者とヴォイドシップの執行官との間で武力衝突が勃発した。航海が終わる頃には教団は排除されたものの、皇帝の優秀な従者の多くが命を落とす事態になってしまった。
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

traits.locale_text: 預言者を始末しようとしたところ、その信者とヴォイドシップの執行官との間で武力衝突が勃発した。航海が終わる頃には教団は排除されたものの、皇帝の優秀な従者の多くが命を落とす事態になってしまった。

languages.text: La tentative d'exclusion du prophète n'a pas l'effet escompté, et des confrontations éclatent entre les adeptes et les prévôts. Ces derniers viennent finalement à bout de la secte, mais de nombreux loyaux serviteurs de l'Empereur ont perdu la vie.
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

traits.locale_text: La tentative d'exclusion du prophète n'a pas l'effet escompté, et des confrontations éclatent entre les adeptes et les prévôts. Ces derniers viennent finalement à bout de la secte, mais de nombreux loyaux serviteurs de l'Empereur ont perdu la vie.

languages.text: Der Versuch, den Propheten zu entfernen, führte zu einer bewaffneten Konfrontation zwischen seinen Anhängern und den Enforcers des Raumschiffs. Der Kult wurde zwar bis zum Ende der Reise eliminiert, zuvor verloren jedoch viele gute Diener des Imperators ihr Leben.
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.

traits.locale_text: Der Versuch, den Propheten zu entfernen, führte zu einer bewaffneten Konfrontation zwischen seinen Anhängern und den Enforcers des Raumschiffs. Der Kult wurde zwar bis zum Ende der Reise eliminiert, zuvor verloren jedoch viele gute Diener des Imperators ihr Leben.

languages.text: Peygamberi ortadan kaldırma girişimi, takipçileri ile uçsuz gemisinin infazcıları arasında silahlı bir çatışmaya yol açtı. Tarikat, yolculuğun sonunda yok edildi ancak bu süreçte İmparator'un birçok sadık hizmetkârı da hayatını kaybetti.
languages.original_text: An attempt to remove the prophet led to an armed confrontation between his followers and the enforcers of the voidship. The cult was eliminated by the end of the voyage, but not before many good servants of the Emperor had lost their lives.
